verses.t: And{G2532} as{G3855} Jesus passed by{G3855}, he saw{G1492} a man{G444} which was blind{G5185} from{G1537} his birth{G1079}.

And{G2532} his{G846} disciples{G3588} asked{G2065} him{G846}, saying{G3004}, Master{G4461}, who{G5101} did sin{G264}, this man{G3778}, or{G2228} his{G846} parents{G3588}, that{G2443} he was born{G1080} blind{G5185}?

Jesus{G3588} answered{G611}, Neither{G3777} hath{G264} this man{G3778} sinned{G264}, nor{G3777} his{G846} parents{G3588}: but{G235} that{G2443} the works{G3588} of God{G3588} should be made manifest{G5319} in{G1722} him{G846}.

I{G1691} must{G1163} work{G2038} the works{G3588} of him that sent{G3992} me{G3165}, while{G2193} it is{G2076} day{G2250}: the night{G3571} cometh{G2064}, when{G3753} no man{G3762} can{G1410} work{G2038}.
As long as{G3752} I am{G5600} in{G1722} the world{G3588}, I am{G1510} the light{G5457} of the world{G3588}.

When he had{G2036} thus{G5023} spoken{G2036}, he spat{G4429} on the ground{G5476}, and{G2532} made{G4160} clay{G4081} of{G1537} the spittle{G3588}, and{G2532} he anointed{G2025} the eyes{G3588} of the blind man{G5185} with the clay{G3588},

And{G2532} said{G2036} unto him{G846}, Go{G5217}, wash{G3538} in{G1519} the pool{G3588} of Siloam{G4611}, (which{G3739} is by interpretation{G2059}, Sent{G649}.) He went his way{G565} therefore{G3767}, and{G2532} washed{G3538}, and{G2532} came{G2064} seeing{G991}.

The neighbours{G1069} therefore{G3767}, and{G2532} they which{G2334} before{G4386} had seen{G2334}him{G846} that{G3754} he was{G2258} blind{G5185}, said{G3004}, Is{G2076} not{G3756} this{G3778} he that sat{G2521} and{G2532} begged{G4319}?
Some{G243} said{G3004}, This{G3778} is he{G2076}: others{G243} said, He is{G2076} like{G3664} him{G846}: but he{G1565} said{G3004}, I{G1473} am{G1510} he.
Therefore{G3767} said they{G3004} unto him{G846}, How{G4459} were{G455} thine{G4675} eyes{G3588} opened{G455}?

He{G1565} answered{G611} and{G2532} said{G2036}, A man{G444} that is called{G3004} Jesus{G2424} made{G4160} clay{G4081}, and{G2532} anointed{G2025} mine{G3450} eyes{G3588}, and{G2532} said{G2036} unto me{G3427}, Go{G5217} to{G1519} the pool{G3588} of Siloam{G4611}, and{G2532} wash{G3538}: and{G1161} I went{G565} and{G2532} washed{G3538}, and I received sight{G308}.
Then{G3767} said they{G2036} unto him{G846}, Where{G4226} is{G2076} he{G1565}? He said{G3004}, I know{G1492} not{G3756}.
They brought{G71} to{G4314} the Pharisees{G3588} him{G846} that{G5185} aforetime{G4218} was blind{G5185}.
And{G1161} it was{G2258} the sabbath day{G4521} when{G3753} Jesus{G3588} made{G4160} the clay{G3588}, and{G2532} opened{G455} his{G846} eyes{G3588}.

Then{G3767} again{G3825} the Pharisees{G3588} also{G2532} asked{G2065} him{G846} how{G4459} he had received his sight{G308}. He said{G2036} unto them{G846}, He put{G2007} clay{G4081} upon{G1909} mine{G3450} eyes{G3588}, and{G2532} I washed{G3538}, and{G2532} do see{G991}.

Therefore{G3767} said{G3004} some{G5100} of{G1537} the Pharisees{G3588}, This{G3778} man{G3588} is{G2076} not{G3756} of{G3844} God{G3588}, because{G3754} he keepeth{G5083} not{G3756} the sabbath day{G3588}. Others{G243} said{G3004}, How{G4459} can{G1410} a man{G444} that is a sinner{G268} do{G4160} such{G5108} miracles{G4592}? And{G2532} there was{G2258} a division{G4978} among{G1722} them{G846}.

They say{G3004} unto the blind man{G5185} again{G3825}, What{G5101} sayest{G3004} thou{G4771} of{G4012} him{G846}, that{G3754} he hath opened{G455} thine{G4675} eyes{G3588}? He said{G2036}, He is{G2076} a prophet{G4396}.

But{G3767} the Jews{G2453} did{G4100} not{G3756} believe{G4100} concerning{G4012} him{G846}, that{G3754} he had been{G2258} blind{G5185}, and{G2532} received his sight{G308}, until{G2193} they called{G5455} the parents{G3588} of him{G846} that had received his sight{G308}.

And{G2532} they asked{G2065} them{G846}, saying{G3004}, Is{G2076} this{G3778} your{G5216} son{G3588}, who{G3739} ye{G5210} say{G3004} was born{G1080} blind{G5185}? how{G4459} then{G3767} doth he{G991} now{G737} see{G991}?

His{G846} parents{G3588} answered{G611} them{G846} and{G2532} said{G2036}, We know{G1492} that{G3754} this{G3778} is{G2076} our{G2257}son{G3588}, and{G2532} that{G3754} he was born{G1080} blind{G5185}:

But{G1161} by what means{G4459} he{G991} now{G3568} seeth{G991}, we know{G1492} not{G3756}; or{G2228} who{G5101} hath opened{G455} his{G846} eyes{G3588}, we{G2249} know{G1492} not{G3756}: he{G846} is of{G2192} age{G2244}; ask{G2065} him{G846}: he{G846} shall speak{G2980} for{G4012} himself{G848}.

These{G5023} words spake{G2036} his{G846} parents{G3588}, because{G3754} they feared{G5399} the Jews{G2453}: for{G1063} the Jews{G2453} had agreed{G4934} already{G2235}, that{G2443} if{G1437} any man{G5100} did confess{G3670} that he was{G846} Christ{G5547}, he should be put{G1096} out of the synagogue{G656}.
Therefore{G1223} said{G2036} his{G846} parents{G3588}, He is{G2192} of age{G2244}; ask{G2065} him{G846}.

Then{G3767} again{G1537} called they{G5455} the man{G3588} that{G3739} was{G2258} blind{G5185}, and{G2532} said{G2036} unto him{G846}, Give{G1325} God{G3588} the praise{G1391}: we{G2249} know{G1492} that{G3754} this{G3778} man{G3588} is{G2076} a sinner{G268}.

He{G1565} answered{G611} and{G2532} said{G2036}, Whether{G1487} he be{G2076} a sinner{G268} or no, I know{G1492} not{G3756}: one thing{G1520} I know{G1492}, that{G3754}, whereas I was{G5607} blind{G5185}, now{G737} I see{G991}.
Then{G1161} said they{G2036} to him{G846} again{G3825}, What{G5101} did he{G4160} to thee{G4671}? how{G4459} opened he{G455} thine{G4675} eyes{G3588}?

He answered{G611} them{G846}, I have told{G2036} you{G5213} already{G2235}, and{G2532} ye did{G191} not{G3756} hear{G191}: wherefore{G5101} would ye{G2309} hear{G191} it again{G3825}? will{G2309} ye{G5210} also{G2532} be{G1096} his{G846} disciples{G3101}?
Then{G3767} they reviled{G3058} him{G846}, and{G2532} said{G2036}, Thou{G4771} art{G1488} his{G1565} disciple{G3101}; but{G1161} we{G2249} are{G2070} Moses'{G3588} disciples{G3101}.
We{G2249} know{G1492} that{G3754} God{G3588} spake{G2980} unto Moses{G3475}: as for{G1161} this{G5126} fellow, we know{G1492} not{G3756} from whence{G4159} he is{G2076}.

The man{G3588} answered{G611} and{G2532} said{G2036} unto them{G846}, Why{G1063} herein{G5129} is{G2076} a marvellous thing{G2298}, that{G3754} ye{G5210} know{G1492} not{G3756} from whence{G4159} he is{G2076}, and{G2532} yet he hath opened{G455} mine{G3450} eyes{G3588}.

Now{G1161} we know{G1492} that{G3754} God{G3588} heareth{G191} not{G3756} sinners{G268}: but{G235} if{G1437} any man{G5100} be{G5600} a worshipper of God{G2318}, and{G2532} doeth{G4160} his{G846} will{G3588}, him{G5127} he heareth{G191}.
Since{G1537} the world began{G3588} was it{G191} not{G3756} heard{G191} that{G3754} any man{G5100} opened{G455} the eyes{G3788} of one that was born{G1080} blind{G5185}.
If{G1487} this man{G3778} were{G2258} not{G3361} of{G3844} God{G2316}he could{G1410} do{G4160} nothing{G3756}.

They answered{G611} and{G2532} said{G2036} unto him{G846}, Thou{G4771} wast{G1080} altogether{G3650} born{G1080} in{G1722} sins{G266}, and{G2532} dost{G1321} thou{G4771} teach{G1321} us{G2248}? And{G2532} they cast{G1544} him{G846} out{G1854}.

Jesus{G3588} heard{G191} that{G3754} they had cast{G1544} him{G846} out{G1854}; and{G2532} when he had found{G2147} him{G846}, he said{G2036} unto him{G846}, Dost{G4100} thou{G4771} believe{G4100} on{G1519} the Son{G3588} of God{G3588}?
He{G1565} answered{G611} and{G2532} said{G2036}, Who{G5101} is he{G2076}, Lord{G2962}, that{G2443} I might believe{G4100} on{G1519} him{G846}?
And{G1161} Jesus{G3588} said{G2036} unto him{G846}, Thou hast{G3708} both{G2532} seen{G3708} him{G846}, and{G2532} it is{G2076} he{G1565} that talketh{G2980} with{G3326} thee{G4675}.
And{G1161} he{G3588} said{G5346}, Lord{G2962}, I believe{G4100}. And{G2532} he worshipped{G4352} him{G846}.

And{G2532} Jesus{G3588} said{G2036}, For{G1519} judgment{G2917} I{G1473} am come{G2064} into{G1519} this{G5126} world{G3588}, that{G2443} they which see{G991} not{G3361} might see{G991}; and{G2532} that they which see might{G991} be made{G1096} blind{G5185}.

And{G2532} some of{G1537} the Pharisees{G3588} which were{G5607} with{G3326} him{G846} heard{G191} these words{G5023}, and{G2532} said{G2036} unto him{G846}, Are{G2070} we{G2249} blind{G5185} also{G2532}?

Jesus{G3588} said{G2036} unto them{G846}, If{G1487} ye were{G2258} blind{G5185}, ye should have{G2192} no{G3756} sin{G266}: but{G1161} now{G3568} ye say{G3004}, We see{G991}; therefore{G3767} your{G5216} sin{G266} remaineth{G3306}.
